name: Revenge Soul
description:
How to Play

Be a Lord Demon Soul. Kill all human soul who come for to kill you and destroy that world. Because the world hate you.

Control

  • Move - WASD or Arrow
  • Shoot  - LeftClick

My Goals And Plan

This is my max development game under 10 days. I learn much from make this game. I get more inspired from brackeys and another developer game to make this game.

Sorry, i don't know how to make devlog, but i have list what i learn in this game:

  1. Make Enemy have distance from another same enemy with script call static List<Rigidbody>. in that case enemy or Prefabs enemy can not overlap with another enemy with same script.
  2. Make story for my game with animation. Out one by one setting use animation.
  3. make ultimate for my player can out shoot auto with rotation and instantiate bullet in 4 place different.
  4. Make UI health above enemy head. To make this i make canvas UI and place that child in enemy and change render mode from overlay to world space and move that UI to above enemy head

One problem i not yet learn from make this game is make background parallax for 2D top-down-shooter. I still learn how make this parallax for top-down-shooter. My plan next for upgrade this game is make parallax background top-down-shooter and another upgrade for player
